headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  LEVY, IRA A

snippet: LEVY--Ira A. The City College of New York mourns the passing of our distinguished alumnus Ira A. Levy, Class of 1971 from the Grove School of Engineering. Mr. Levy, former Executive Vice President of AECOM, served on the Civil Engineering Advisory Committee at the Grove School of Engineering. His generosity and devotion to the CCNY community inspire us all. City College extends our sincerest condolences to the Levy family and their friends at AECOM. Lisa S. Coico, President 1/3
lead_paragraph: LEVY--Ira A. The City College of New York mourns the passing of our distinguished alumnus Ira A. Levy, Class of 1971 from the Grove School of Engineering. Mr. Levy, former Executive Vice President of AECOM, served on the Civil Engineering Advisory Committee at the Grove School of Engineering. His generosity and devotion to the CCNY community inspire us all. City College extends our sincerest condolences to the Levy family and their friends at AECOM. Lisa S. Coico, President 1/3
